CodeExample.Title: Call the Group/SubscribeByMail action
CodeExample.Summary: To call the Group/SubscribeByMail action,submit a POST request of the following REST call syntax.
CodeExample.Request: POST /<version>/myOrganization/groups/<Group.objectId>/SubscribeByMail HTTP/1.1 Host : graph.microsoft.com Authorization : Bearer <access_token> Accept : application/json;odata=verbose Content-Length : 0

Remarks.string: A successful call to the Group/SubscribeByMail action returns an empty response.
